entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes #54420
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54419
  • [WebView2] WebViewManager does not search for the correct staticwebassets.runtime.json file when using a BlazorWebView from another csproj #54417
  • Any plans for Managed Identity authentication for Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis? #54414
  • Dynamically updating AuthentionSchemes on AuthorizationPolicies #54412
  • Perf improvement: https #54408
  • Problem with using AuthorizeView in blazor with prerendering #54407

Closed

  • Perf regression: plaintext, updates #54392
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext #54409
  • MVC view with _framework/blazor.web.js doesn't import *.lib.module.js #54397
  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext #54382
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #48208
  • Investigate metrics endpoint behavior when exception middleware runs #52648
  • Restarting browser windows doesn't resolve CERT_INVALID error #54026
  • Blazor .NET 8 with Authorize attribute, "No Authentication Scheme" when running in Azure App Services #52326
  • Has anyone worked with an Asp.net Core Web API project implementing API versioning in .Net 8.0 and successfully deployed it in IIS? #53965
  • OAuth token endpoint failure when token contain an empty error field #53457
  • Identity functions not working #54248
  • CascadingParameter in EditForm causes InputText to re-render on every keystroke which loses cursor position. #54208

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable publishing in VMR #54422
    area-infrastructure
  • Install java via native tools in CI #54421
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport to net8 - Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54413
    Servicing-consider, feature-caching, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Remove CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink test from retry list #54406
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Add a github workflow to update NPM dependencies #54000
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24153.2 #54345
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54368
    area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.29
